knimeNode.name: stringMLST
knimeNode.shortDescription: Fast k-mer based tool for multi locus sequence typing (MLST).

intro.p: Fast k-mer based tool for multi locus sequence typing (MLST).

fullDescription.option: Calculate seqence coverage for each allele. Turns off fuzzy (-z 1). Requires bwa, bamtools and samtools.
Kmer length for the stringMLST database which is used for assigning STs to input sample files.

Threshold for reporting a fuzzy match. For higher coverage reads this threshold should be set higher to avoid indicating fuzzy match when exact match was more likely. For lower coverage reads, threshold smaller or equal to 100 is recommended

ports.inPort: Path to first fastq file for paired end sample and path to the fastq file for single end file. [fq,fastq]
Path to second fastq file for paired end sample. [fq,fastq,opt.]
Config file: is a tab delimited file which has the information for typing scheme i.e. loci, its multifasta file and profile definition file. [*]
ports.outPort: Output file with alleles and sequence types. [txt,tsv,csv]
A seperate reads file is created which has all the reads covering all the locus. [fq,fastq]

views.view: The text sent to standard out during the execution of stringMLST.
The text sent to standard error during the execution of stringMLST. (If it appears in gray, it's the output of a previously failing run which is preserved for your trouble shooting.)
